attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The secretary of state for sport, culture and media has decided that cycling no longer warrents being called a sport, therefore stopping all funding for recreational cycling. How can cycling not be called a sport, when the ever so demanding "sport" of darts can be.

rejection.details: Your claim about reclassifying cycling is unsubstantiated.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
